body_html: I see. One thing to note is that you probably don't want to use the module-based profiler. If you use F.relu it will never show up, while it will still appear in the autograd profiler. Additionally, this profiler won't be able to measure CUDA time as is, while autograd profiler can deal with that.
body_text: I see. One thing to note is that you probably don't want to use the module-based profiler. If you use F.relu it will never show up, while it will still appear in the autograd profiler. Additionally, this profiler won't be able to measure CUDA time as is, while autograd profiler can deal with that.
body: I see. One thing to note is that you probably don't want to use the module-based profiler. If you use `F.relu` it will never show up, while it will still appear in the autograd profiler. Additionally, this profiler won't be able to measure CUDA time as is, while autograd profiler can deal with that.
